name: "Sly 3" - "Dead Men Tell No Tales" (PS2) Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the location of this level called?
questions.explanation:
Blood Bath Bay & Bloodbath Bay.

	Blood Bath Bay is home to many pirates, including the smartest man of the seven seas, LeFwee.  LeFwee wants to capture Penelope so she can become his wife.

questions.text: How many x's must you make in order to find the treasure?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	In order to find the treasure, hidden between the first S and the O in the SOS, you must make 6 x's.  Note, however, that there were seven clues, but you never made a seventh x in the SOS.  You simply started digging.

questions.text: When Sly was pretending to be a pirate, what test did he claim to forget his pencil to?
questions.explanation:
Scantron Test.

	Trying to be funny, Sly claims to forget his pencil to the scantron test.  Poor Bentley is always sick and tired of these jokes, however.

questions.text: When on the island, how many whackable trees are there when you are pretending to be a monkey?
questions.explanation:
Eighteen.

	There are 18 whackable trees, although there are MANY more trees that you can't wack but can see.  Also, make sure you didn't answer according to the island with the treasure.  Although there are whackable trees, you do not want to count those in your answer since it was only for when you are pretending to be a monkey.

questions.text: How many planks are on the major bridge on the island, going to the whackable trees you hit pretending to be a monkey?
questions.explanation:
Twenty-three.

	This is a suspension bridge.  You can walk on the bridge, or even walk on the rope of the bridge in order not to get caught.  Either way, it gets you across much easier than taking the rocks in the water.

options: None of the above, it was his dad!
questions.explanation:
Reme Lousteau.

	Dimitri wanted Sly to find his grandfather's swimsuit for him, which Dimitri claimed looks good with his greasy sweet suit.  Sly had to find this for Dimitri because he still owed him a favor from back in Holland.

questions.text: How many cannon amplification collars must Dimitri collect?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	Dimitri must collect six cannon amplification collars without getting eaten alive by sharks.  Even though there are more than six collars in the area, six is all you need, so they are fairly easy to find.

questions.text: How many hammerheads must Dimitri kill?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	He must capture five hammerheads to help the gang.  The hammerheads are attracted to the goldfish bones, so he had to kill two of those first.

questions.text: What was the final operation's name?
questions.explanation:
Reverse Double-Cross.

	Reverse Double-Cross was the name of the operation to save Penelope.  Penelope has a crush on Sly until Bentley is there to save her, so she ends up liking Bentley.  They become boyfriend and girlfriend from there on out.

questions.text: What is LeFwee's second first mate's name?
options: He only had one first mate!
questions.explanation:
Jones.

	Did the question throw you off?  Remember, LeFwee's first 1st mate didn't accomplish the tasks he was assigned, so he called Jones in and promoted him to 1st mate.  LeFwee even KILLED the first first mate for not doing what he was told.  That is some tough punishment!  There was no "Smith" or "Lopez" in this level.
